00043 
00044 #ifndef OPENCV_GPU_WARP_REDUCE_HPP__
00045 #define OPENCV_GPU_WARP_REDUCE_HPP__
00046 
00047 namespace cv { namespace gpu { namespace device
00048 {
00049     template <class T>
00050     __device__ __forceinline__ T warp_reduce(volatile T *ptr , const unsigned int tid = threadIdx.x)
00051     {
00052         const unsigned int lane = tid & 31; // index of thread in warp (0..31)
00053 
00054         if (lane < 16)
00055         {
00056             T partial = ptr[tid];
00057 
00058             ptr[tid] = partial = partial + ptr[tid + 16];
00059             ptr[tid] = partial = partial + ptr[tid + 8];
00060             ptr[tid] = partial = partial + ptr[tid + 4];
00061             ptr[tid] = partial = partial + ptr[tid + 2];
00062             ptr[tid] = partial = partial + ptr[tid + 1];
00063         }
00064 
00065         return ptr[tid - lane];
00066     }
00067 }}} // namespace cv { namespace gpu { namespace device {
00068 
00069 #endif /* OPENCV_GPU_WARP_REDUCE_HPP__ */
